message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Considering its value and your interest, we're extending this opportunity to you for $10000. This is a special deal tailored for you, aiming to provide you with significant savings while ensuring you receive a high-quality product that's worth more than $8000 to you. We believe this price offers a great balance between value and affordability. Please let us know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
